mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_ID FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{id}
SELECT MEMBER_NICKNAME FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NICKNAME = #{nickname}
SELECT MEMBER_PHONENUMBER FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NICKNAME = #{phone}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER(MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PASSWORD, MEMBER_PHONENUMBER , MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_SEX, MEMBER_BIRTH, MEMBER_REGISTE_DATE) VALUES(#{memberId}, #{memberPassword}, #{memberPhoneNumber} , #{memberNickname}, #{memberSex}, #{memberBirth}, NOW())
